summary: Dedicated Activity Specialist and educator with 10+ years of vocal training and 8+ years of teaching experience. Experience in music education, special education, and hands-on learning. Skilled collaborator with teachers and parents, strong communicator and problem-solver, proficient with MS Office suite and design/education tools. Passionate about helping students reach their full potential.

experience.title: Activity Specialist
experience.description: Counselor for ages 6-12; supervision of children and tutor in music and recreational activities. Routinely met with students' parents regarding in-class issues and learning interruptions to discuss solutions. Performed student background reviews to develop tailored lessons based on student needs. Created and enforced child-based hands-on curriculum to promote student interest and receptive learning. Earned positive verbal/written feedback from parents regarding classroom instruction and student learning success. Developed course plans to meet academic, intellectual and social needs of students.

experience.title: Lead Teacher Chorus
experience.description: Set up and conducted school choir in numerous productions of vocal music. Provided aural training through performance of music, talks, discussions, use of audiovisual equipment, practical vocal music and written assignments. Trained students for vocal performances in school and abroad at the Colonial Theatre in Pittsfield, Massachusetts for two consecutive years.

experience.title: Activity Specialist / Lead Teacher
experience.description: Created a learning environment for students by stimulating purposeful assignments conducive to their immediate environments. Guided students to create food drives, recycling campaigns, and help provide aid to countries in need.

experience.title: Sales Associate
experience.description: Retail services in Shoe department. Participated in daily operational functions of the store. Delivered superior quality service while adhering to corporate, regulatory and audit guidelines. Provided timely and efficient completion of client transactions while maintaining accurate customer service and thorough handling of all sales.

experience.title: Classroom Teacher
experience.description: Facilitate classroom training to both English and bilingual students in vocal music, music history, and school productions. Headed the performing arts department in design, development, costuming and maintenance of art materials as well as set design by evaluating the effectiveness of the performing arts through instrumental/vocal music, dance, drama, art and technology. Co-facilitated weekly meetings and helped implement changes to improve student growth.

education.degree: Bachelor of Arts in Professional Music
education.school: Berklee College of Music, Boston, MA

education.degree: Music Diploma - Voice and Music Theory
